triggers.label: Stream status
triggers.description: Emitted every 2 seconds when stream is active

arguments.label: KbitsPerSec
arguments.description: Amount of data per second (in kilobits) transmitted by the stream encoder

arguments.label: TotalStreamTime
arguments.description: Total time (in seconds) since the stream started

arguments.label: NumTotalFrames
arguments.description: Total number of frames transmitted since the stream started

arguments.label: NumDroppedFrames
arguments.description: Number of frames dropped by the encoder since the stream started

arguments.label: RenderMissedFrames
arguments.description: Number of frames missed due to rendering lag

arguments.label: OutputSkippedFrames
arguments.description: Number of frames skipped due to encoding lag

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene to switch to

result.label: SceneName
result.description: Name of the currently active scene

actions.label: Get source properties
actions.description: Gets the scene specific properties of the specified source item. Coordinates are relative to the item's parent (the scene or group it belongs to).

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

parameters.label: SourceName
parameters.description: Source name

result.label: SourceProperties
result.description: Source properties. Get a list here: https://github.com/Palakis/obs-websocket/blob/4.x-current/docs/generated/protocol.md#getsceneitemproperties (dots are replaced with underscores)

actions.label: Set source properties
actions.description: Sets the scene specific properties of a source. Unspecified properties will remain unchanged. Coordinates are relative to the item's parent (the scene or group it belongs to).

parameters.label: SourceProperties
parameters.description: Source properties. Get a list here: https://github.com/Palakis/obs-websocket/blob/4.x-current/docs/generated/protocol.md#setsceneitemproperties (dots are replaced with underscores)

parameters.label: AnimationDuration
parameters.description: Animate changes for duration in milliseconds (1/1000s). Leave blank or 0 for no animation.

parameters.label: AnimationEaseIn
parameters.description: Ease animation start

parameters.label: AnimationEaseOut
parameters.description: Ease animation end

actions.label: Set source position
actions.description: Sets the scene specific position of a source. Coordinates are relative to the item's parent (the scene or group it belongs to).

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

parameters.label: SourceName
parameters.description: Source name

parameters.label: PositionX
parameters.description: The new x position of the source

parameters.label: PositionY
parameters.description: The new y position of the source

parameters.label: PositionAlignment
parameters.description: The point on the source that the item is manipulated from. The sum of 1=Left or 2=Right, and 4=Top or 8=Bottom, or omit to center on that axis.

parameters.label: AnimationDuration
parameters.description: Animate changes for duration in milliseconds (1/1000s). Leave blank or 0 for no animation.

parameters.description: Ease animation start

parameters.description: Ease animation end

actions.label: Set source in-/visible
actions.description: Sets the scene specific visibility of a source

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

parameters.label: SourceName
parameters.description: Source name

parameters.label: Visible
parameters.description: The new visibility of the source. 'true' shows source, 'false' hides source

actions.label: Set source un-/locked
actions.description: Sets the scene specific locked status of a source

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

parameters.label: SourceName
parameters.description: Source name

parameters.label: Locked
parameters.description: The new locked status of the source. 'true' keeps it in its current position, 'false' allows movement.

actions.label: Set source bounds
actions.description: Sets the scene specific bounds of a source

parameters.label: SceneName
parameters.description: Name of the scene the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

parameters.label: SourceName
parameters.description: Source name

parameters.label: BoundsType
parameters.description: The new bounds type of the source. Can be OBS_BOUNDS_STRETCH, OBS_BOUNDS_SCALE_INNER, OBS_BOUNDS_SCALE_OUTER, OBS_BOUNDS_SCALE_TO_WIDTH, OBS_BOUNDS_SCALE_TO_HEIGHT, OBS_BOUNDS_MAX_ONLY or OBS_BOUNDS_NONE

parameters.label: BoundsAlignment
parameters.description: The new alignment of the bounding box. (0-2, 4-6, 8-10)

parameters.label: BoundsX
parameters.description: The new width of the bounding box

parameters.label: BoundsY
parameters.description: The new height of the bounding box
